B

BoeBot - Class in TI
The BoeBot class is the main interface to the BoeBot board.
BoeBot() - Constructor for class TI.BoeBot
 

D

dataRead(int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Reads data from the internal memory of the Raspberry Pi
dataStore(int, int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Stores data on the internal memory of the Raspberry Pi
digitalRead(int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Read the state of a pin.
digitalWrite(int, boolean) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Will put a pin in output mode, and set the state high if value is true, and low if value is false If this pin is in input mode, will switch to output mode

M

mark() - Method in class TI.Timer
Reset the timer

P

pulseIn(int, boolean, int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Waits for a pulse on a pin timeout milliseconds
PWM - Class in TI
Class to run a PWM in the background
PWM(int, int) - Constructor for class TI.PWM
Creates and starts the PWM

S

Servo - Class in TI
Class to control servo motors, and keep them under control in the background
Servo(int) - Constructor for class TI.Servo
Creates a servo on a specific pin, and starts it right away
setInterval(int) - Method in class TI.Timer
Sets the interval to another time, and reset the timer
start() - Method in class TI.PWM
Starts or resumes the PWM
start() - Method in class TI.Servo
Starts (or resumes) the servo
stop() - Method in class TI.PWM
Stops the PWM
stop() - Method in class TI.Servo
Stops the servo

T

TI - package TI
 
timeout() - Method in class TI.Timer
Used to indicate if this timer has passed the interval.
Timer - Class in TI
A simple timer class, to perform tasks at a certain frequency
Timer(int) - Constructor for class TI.Timer
Creates the timer, and sets it to fire after the specified interval

U

update(int) - Method in class TI.PWM
updates and starts the PWM
update(int) - Method in class TI.Servo
Changes the servo's speed
uwait(int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Waits for a specific time Warning: if the delay is too short, will use busy waiting

W

wait(int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Waits for a specific time Warning: this delay is not very accurate
wait(int, int) - Static method in class TI.BoeBot
Waits for a specific time
